entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 10:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
